long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience Smart Bilingual Webpage Translation

Our tool focuses on identifying the main content areas of a webpage, displaying both the original text and translation by paragraph for a clear bilingual reading experience.

Key Features:

- Intelligent Main Content Detection: Utilizes smart identification of the main content area for bilingual webpage translation, minimizing "intrusiveness" on the original site to enhance your foreign language reading and translation experience.
- Flexible Bilingual Display: Displays translations by paragraph and allows customization of paragraph length to suit your reading needs.
- Support for Multiple Translation Services: Includes Google, Bing, OpenAI, Gemini, Claude, and others.
- PDF and eBook Translation Support: Translates PDF files and enables bilingual reading of eBooks through epub online readers.
- Personalized Translation Styles: Offers various translation styles to create a personalized reading experience.
Privacy Policy:

We do not collect any personal information. However, webpage content will be sent to third-party translation services such as Google, Microsoft, and OpenAI for processing.
